content:
Hello, One Medical is getting set up to certify its EHR. We are looking for some contractors with experience with G10, in particular the areas involving app authorization, and patient token and identity management. If you would be interested in being a contractor and helping us with these areas, please let me know, and I can forward your contact information to that team. Feel free to forward this, or to message me if you'd like additional details.

Thanks!

-Daniel
This topic was moved here from #social > Contractor for G10 auth server work at One Medical by Josh Mandel
